subject: Urgent: Q4 Report Due
body:
Hi Team,

I need the Q4 financial report by this Friday at 5 PM. Please ensure all department summaries are included.

Thanks,
Boss

subject: Tech Weekly: AI Revolution
body: This week in tech: New AI models released, stock market updates, and more...

subject: Meeting Request: Project Kickoff
body:
Hello,

We would like to schedule a kickoff meeting for the new project next Tuesday at 2 PM EST. Does that work for you?

Best,
Client

subject: You won a cruise!
body: Click here to claim your free cruise vacation! Limited time offer.

subject: Lunch?
body: Hey, anyone up for tacos today?

subject: Open Enrollment for Benefits
body:
Hi Everyone,

Open enrollment for health benefits starts next week. Please review the attached guide and make your selections by Nov 15th.

Regards,
HR

subject: Update on Phase 1
body: Phase 1 is 90% complete. We just need to finalize the UI mocks. Can you review them by tomorrow morning?

subject: Your subscription is renewing
body: Your monthly subscription will renew on Oct 30th. No action needed if you wish to continue.

subject: New job opportunity
body: I saw your profile and thought you'd be a great fit for this Senior Developer role...

subject: Sunday Dinner
body: Are you coming over for dinner this Sunday? Let me know so I can buy groceries.

subject: Server Maintenance
body: Scheduled maintenance will occur this Saturday from 2 AM to 4 AM. Expect downtime.

subject: New Logo Assets
body: Here are the final logo assets for the website. Please update them on the landing page.

subject: All Hands Meeting
body: Reminder: All Hands meeting tomorrow at 10 AM in the main conference room.

subject: Ticket #1234 Resolved
body: Your support ticket #1234 has been marked as resolved. Please rate your experience.

subject: Security Training
body: You have not completed the mandatory security training. Please complete it by end of day.
